item.title: Microsoft to launch an identity platform through the blockchain | HolyTransaction
item.description:
Microsoft to launch an identity platform through the blockchain | HolyTransaction

The well-known tech giant Microsoft recently started a partnership with Blockstack Labs and ConsenSys to create an open-source platform to integrate both the Bitcoin and Ethereum blockchains. In today's blog post published by Microsoft blockchain business strategist Yorke Rhodes III, in fact, he explained that the company will create an open source framework on Azure, where developers can build their own identity applications.

item.title: Bitwage to Partner Up With Uphold to Offer Ether Payrolls
item.description:
Bitwage to Partner Up With Uphold to Offer Ether Payrolls

Both companies have decided to form an alliance to allow businesses to pay their workers in ether, the new popular Cryptocurrency. Bitwage announced the new feature on their corporate blog, the company states the importance of Ethereum's platform, as it is 'The new , hot Cryptocurrency that has taken the spotlight for enterprises, entrepreneurs, and speculators all over the world'.

item.title: Censorship-Free Social Network AKASHA Aims to Tackle Internet Censorship With Blockchain Technology
item.description:
Censorship-Free Social Network AKASHA Aims to Tackle Internet Censorship With Blockchain Technology

A few weeks ago Bitcoin Magazine published a report on the launch of AKASHA, a blockchain-based social network built on top of Ethereum and IPFS (the InterPlanetary File System).

item.title: Bitcoin values up on Chinese yuan concerns
item.description:
Bitcoin values up on Chinese yuan concerns

Bitcoin prices have hit their highest values in nearly two years, driven by demand in China. The digital currency hit $546.80 on CoinDesk 's Bitcoin Price Index Tuesday, its highest mark since August 2014. The price remained at $540.81 Wednesday on the index, a 21% increase over the last month.

item.title: Prenup Built in Ethereum Smart Contract Rethinks Marriage Obligations - CoinDesk
item.description:
Prenup Built in Ethereum Smart Contract Rethinks Marriage Obligations - CoinDesk

Thanks to a new prenuptial agreement uploaded to the Ethereum blockchain, your insistence on watching Walking Dead could be a violable offense. So, too, could the frequency at which you shop, the number of chores you do, and your preference to your mother's spaghetti recipe over your spouse's.

item.title: Mediachain Labs Receives $1.5 Million in Seed Funding from Union Square Ventures
item.description:
Mediachain Labs Receives $1.5 Million in Seed Funding from Union Square Ventures

Mediachain, a open source platform using blockchain technology to track media ownership, has received $1.5 million in seed funding from Union Square Ventures and Andreessen Horowitz - two of the biggest VC investors in the blockchain and digital currency space. The funding round also saw participation from RRE Ventures, Alexis Ohanian, William Mougayar and Digital Currency Group, among others.

item.title: Blockchain Evangelists Plot Retreat to Billionaire Richard Branson's Private Island - CoinDesk
item.description:
Blockchain Evangelists Plot Retreat to Billionaire Richard Branson's Private Island - CoinDesk

Richard Branson's private island in the Caribbean is set to host yet another blockchain-focused gathering, drawing a range of guests from around the world including the former prime minister of Haiti and a member of the European Union Parliament.

item.title: BTCS increases ethereum-mining hosting business
item.description:
BTCS increases ethereum-mining hosting business

Blockchain technology company BTCS, Inc. announced last week that it had increased its ethereum-mining hosting business from approximately 50 kilowatts announced in March, 2016 to approximately 150...

item.title: Monero Technical Analysis for 06/01/2016 - Price Trapped Between Major Pivot Levels
item.description:
Monero Technical Analysis for 06/01/2016 - Price Trapped Between Major Pivot Levels

The big pivot zone at 0.00195 - which was outlined in the previous Monero article on 05/23/2016 - should still be watched, even though price is currently trading well underneath this level. On the 26th, this level was used as support/resistance; the 2-hour chart for that day show this quite clearly.

item.title: PayPal files Bitcoin payment patent " Banking Technology
item.description:
PayPal files Bitcoin payment patent " Banking Technology

PayPal has filed a US patent application for a modular payment module that accepts Bitcoin and other digital currencies. The application names Bitcoin, Litecoin and Dogecoin; and sets out the physical characteristics of the module. It says: "The module includes a chassis which has a modular device connector.
